name: SiltSDK
summary: A library to help customer of Silt get integrated and verify users
description:
This Lib provides three components: SitWebviewController, SiltTrademark, SiltButton. 
SiltWebview will open the verification worlflow of a provided customer.
SiltTrademark or SiltButton are a UILabel and a UIButton that at least one of them need to be used in the customer's app.
